summary: Dynamic CMS-driven Navigation Testing Complete - All 11 features verified. Backend: 15/15 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All features verified via Playwright.
passed_tests: Public navbar at / dynamically loads menu items from CMS API /api/menus?visible_only=true
4 top-level nav items visible: Corporate Identity, Operational/Compliance, Employee Services, Communication
Hovering 'Corporate Identity' shows dropdown with: Corporate Overview, Corporate Philosophy, Corporate History & Group Structure
Hovering 'Communication' shows dropdown with: News & Announcements, Events Calendar, Photo Gallery
Admin Menu Management at /admin/menus shows all seeded items with hierarchy
Admin can add a new top-level menu item
Admin can add a submenu item under an existing parent
Admin can toggle visibility of a menu item â€” hidden items show 'Hidden' badge and don't appear in public navbar
Admin can delete a menu item
GET /api/menus returns tree structure with children nested properly
seed_data_creation: Menu items seeded via /api/seed endpoint with 4 L1 items (Corporate Identity, Operational/Compliance, Employee Services, Communication) each with 3 L2 children. Test items (TEST_TopLevelItem, TEST_Submenu) were created and deleted during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dynamic CMS-driven navigation fully tested. Public navbar at / loads menus from API with dropdown support on hover. Admin Menu Management at /admin/menus supports full CRUD (add/edit/delete/toggle visibility/reorder). 3-level hierarchy supported (L1 main nav, L2 dropdown, L3 flyout). Backend API endpoints: GET /api/menus (tree structure), GET /api/menus?visible_only=true (filtered), GET /api/menus/flat, POST/PUT/DELETE /api/menus. Test file: /app/backend/tests/test_menu_dynamic_nav.py
